alert.note: Alert for Bamberg; Barnwell; Central Orangeburg; Southeastern Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 4:02PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Barnwell, northwestern Bamberg and central Orangeburg Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 402 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Bamberg, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Orangeburg, Bamberg, Denmark, Brookdale, Blackville, Bowman, Orangeburg County Airport, Claflin College, Barnwell State Park, Edisto Gardens, South Carolina State University, Norway, Rowesville, Cordova, Cope, Yonder Field, Wilkinson Heights, Prince of Orange Mall, Edisto and Bamberg County Airport. This includes Interstate 26 between mile markers 143 and 158. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bamberg; Barnwell; Central Orangeburg; Southeastern Orangeburg
